title: Stitches in Time Travel
description: Some say the past cannot be changed. Well, the past hasn't met Charlotte.Forced by her two moms to spend Christmas at her grandmother's dusty old house, 10-year-old Charlotte discovers the impossible: an ancient family quilt that travels through time! Now she's trapped in the past with just a needle and thread and a whole lot of questions.The only people who can help are her mother, grandmother and great-grandmother. The problem is that they're 10 years old as well!Join Charlotte on this magical, time-travelling, Christmas adventure, where there's more than presents under the tree - there are pasts and futures! This page-turning, timeless tale is perfect for children age 8-12.
author: Peter G.  Reynolds
